Address.value: 1100 MELVILLE STREET,SUITE 838, VANCOUVER, British Columbia, V6E 4A6, Canada

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Platinum Group Metals Ltd is the operator of the Waterberg Project, a bulk underground PGM deposit located in South Africa. Waterberg was discovered by Platinum Group and is being jointly developed with Implats, the Japan Oil, Gas and Metals National Corporation (JOGMEC) and Hanwa Co. Ltd. Waterberg has the potential to be a large-scale, low-cost producer of palladium, platinum, rhodium, and gold. Geographically, it operates in Canada and South Africa.
